channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Activate Your Japanese!
channel.desc:
Drama "Xuan Tackles Japan!"
After passing out, Xuan finds herself waking up in a hotel room. Ota feels responsible for Xuan's blackout and tells her that she no longer needs to be a part of the planning team for the hotel's autumn campaign. But Xuan actually wants to plan for the campaign. What should she do?
"Onomatopoeia" -Share Feelings- Dondon
"Welcome to My Japan!" focuses on the life of Silvia DE SOUZA from Brazil, who works at a factory that coats metal parts in Toyama Prefecture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: Japanese high-tech toys, fusing advanced technology and \"kawaii\" culture, are booming, even in education and space exploration. Through a Chinese woman at a toy maker, we look at their global advance.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: Cycle Around Japan has teamed up with Taiwan's public broadcaster, PTS, for a three-part series airing this fall. Experience Taiwan's lush scenery, and meet guardians of traditional culture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsline Asia 24
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: Kisoji is an old road that runs through Kiso in Nagano Prefecture, which is located along the Nakasendo, one of the main highroads connecting Tokyo and Kyoto Prefecture. Stretching 80 kilometers from north to south, the Kisoji is home to 11 \"post towns\" along its trail. The road has been used for about 400 years, with feudal lords from all over Japan using it to get to Tokyo to serve the shogun during the Samurai period. In this episode, we tour the post towns and see the deep facets of the Kisoji route.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from November 9, Day 1 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Fukuoka.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: This upbeat program combines business and economic news with in-depth feature stories that give you a closer look at the latest trends within Japan and around the world.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: We revisit Pakistani Habib ur Rahman, a crafter of custom-made power wheelchairs in Kobayashi, Miyazaki Prefecture, and meet Edson Moreno, a Brazilian truck driver based in Iwata, Shizuoka Prefecture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Since 2021, Yoshida Hirofumi has been principal guest conductor of the Odesa National Academic Opera and Ballet Theater in Ukraine. He talks about what he hopes to convey through music amid conflict.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Impacts: Climates Change The World
channel.desc: The world is too divided to unite and tackle the issue of the Earth getting hotter every year. Alongside the COP30 discussions, we will explore possible ways to overcome this harsh reality.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life
channel.desc: We come across a tranquil, snow-covered Edo cityscape. But there's something in the air -- the aroma of foods both sweet and savory that helped the townspeople keep warm in the winter.\n\n*\"Bikuni Bridge in Snow,\" from the series \"One Hundred Famous Views of Edo\" (1858) by Utagawa Hiroshige.

channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Geto Kogen lies in an area of Japan known as a gosetsu chitai?a region with extremely heavy snowfall. In an average year it gets as much as five meters of snow, and that means it can offer runs found in few other parts of the country. These days people come from around the world to find out what makes this resort special. They start their day with some fresh tracks, taking the gondola to the top ahead of the official opening time when the slopes are covered with pristine snow. They enjoy tree runs with deep powder snow through wooded areas that are usually off-limits at other ski resorts. And they head out for some backcountry skiing along with accredited guides. On this episode, Michael Keida and his wife Kumiko take full advantage of the JAPOW conditions at this gosetsu paradise.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.title: Nhk Newsline

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef
channel.desc: Learn about Japanese home cooking with Master Chef Saito, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques! Featured recipes: (1) Miso Sukiyaki with Beef and Mushrooms (2) Japanese Turnips with Natto Dressing.

channel.name: NHK World JP

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Document 72 Hours
channel.desc: Newsstands have all but disappeared from the area around Shibuya Station in Tokyo. Yet, one still operates, even as sales keep falling. For three days, we asked customers what they bought, and why.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Sekiguchi Itaru helped to restore the pipe organ at Notre Dame in Paris, following the cathedral's fire in 2019. He tells us about his work, including the tuning and voicing of these instruments.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Impacts: Climates Change The World
channel.desc: Episode 2 of this series on COP30 in Brazil focuses on \"Amazon dieback.\" Deforestation has reached 17%, and scientists warn that exceeding a figure of 20% could disrupt the water cycle.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life
channel.desc: Caught in an evening shower, Edo townspeople scramble across a bridge in search of shelter. On the river beyond, a lone figure steers his boat, unfazed by the rain. What is his destination?\n\n*\"Sudden Shower over Shin-Ohashi Bridge and Atake,\" from the series \"One Hundred Famous Views of Edo\" (1857) by Utagawa Hiroshige.

channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo

channel.desc: Newsstands have all but disappeared from the area around Shibuya Station in Tokyo. Yet, one still operates, even as sales keep falling. For three days, we asked customers what they bought, and why.

channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: Originally used to study habitats and behaviors, sensors attached to animals are now being used to monitor the Earth's environment more broadly.[(96057)]
